section: This Website Design, Development and Hosting Agreement the ("Agreement") is entered into on January 11, 2018 by and between Natalija Tunevic, director of FreeCook (hereinafter referred to as "Client") and Mitchell Vitalis, director of Mitchell's Web Advance, PLC (hereinafter referred to as "Service Provider").
explanation: This introduces a contradiction by defining Mitchell's Web Advance, PLC as 'Service Provider' when that name is not used throughout the contract, as 'Company' is used instead. This creates ambiguity and misalignment.

section: Service Provider will not make any attempt to proof read or correct any contextual, grammatical or typographical errors in the written content submitted by Client. It is Client's sole responsibility to check the accuracy of the written content and correct any errors prior to submission for final publication. Entity will assume that all the written content submitted by Client has been proofread and is ready for publication.
explanation: The last sentence uses the term 'Entity,' which has not been defined anywhere in the contract, introducing a contradiction and misalignment of terminology.

section: Service Provider, either directly or through its authorized vendor, shall provide customer support (the "Customer Support") relating to Client Website consisting of replying to customer questions or complaints regarding website hosting services during the normal business hours set forth.
explanation: The paragraph then shifts to referring to 'Company' having the sole discretion to alter or cease providing Customer Support, which contradicts the previous statement indicating that the 'Service Provider' must provide this service. This is also misaligned since 'Company' and 'Service Provider' are supposed to be referring to the same entity.
